column33: Warner Brothers: Warner Brothers, Apologise to Johnny Depp and give him his job back!
column34:

We’ve listened to Amber Heard abusing Johnny Depp. She has openly admitted to slamming his head in a door, slapping him, hitting him, throwing things at him, and more. It's very very clear who is the abuser in that relationship. Johnny Depp is innocent, and we all know it. That is what the evidence says, including the witnesses. Ex partners of Amber say she is abusive. Ex partners of Johnny say he is a saint.


And yet, Warner Brothers Studios have forced Depp to resign from his latest movie - ‘Fantastic Beasts And Where To Find Them’! An action is clearly based on the libel trial he recently lost. But this kind of trial should not be taken as proof he was an abuser - libel trials are not about that. In order to win, Johnny would have needed to prove that The Sun Newspaper knew the allegations were false at the time of printing. Like most libel trials, this is nearly impossible. Quite possibly even more so here as there is mounting suspicion that the judge and his ties to Amber herself.

As such, we demand that Warner Brothers Studios deliver a personal apology to Johnny Depp, and re-offer him the role of Grindelwald in the next Fantastic Beasts movie. We the undersigned pledge to boycott the movie if you do not do this.
Johnny, and other male victims of domestic abuse, have suffered enough. Stop acting as the instrument of his abuser. Stop caving to Amber. Do not employ her in your company. Treat her as the proven abuser she is.
